name: Poppin' Soda
description:
Part of VGDC's Fall-ty Game Jam 2021

WASD to move

Left click to shoot and mouse to aim. 

Collect soda cans to modify your gun.  Blue Can is a super shot. Red Can is a stream fire, Orange fires in spreads. 

Survive as long as you can. 

Credits:

Manny Salcedo: Lead Programmer (Player, Power-ups)

Nicole Nguyen: Lead Artist, Composer

Ethan Maxwell Weissenberg: Designer, Programmer

Nathan Richards; Programmer (Enemies, Spawning)
